layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x124
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x124
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x92 [color=#008000]
      LayoutBR {br} at (0,0) size 0x74
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,74) size 166x18
        text run at (0,74) width 166: "This line should be green."
